List.Name: List
List.Description: An instance of the R4 List FHIR resource.

code.Name: code
code.Description: The code representing the type of list searched. Always " problems".

emptyReason.Name: emptyReason
emptyReason.Description: If the patient has no problems documented, the API returns an emptyReason of “notstarted”.

entry.Name: entry
entry.Description: Each entry is a BackboneElement with the "item" property populated with a reference to the Condition resource and the "display" property populated with the problem name.

item.Name: item
item.Description: List of FHIR IDs returned by the Condition (Problems) resource search, excluding external and deleted problems.

mode.Name: mode
mode.Description: The processing mode that applies to this list. Always "working".

status.Name: status
status.Description: Status of the problem list. Always "current" because each list represents only the patient’s current problems.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Reference to the Patient resource with which the List is associated.

title.Name: title
title.Description: The title representing this entity. Always “Problem List”.
